abstract: Three years after YouTube and Google began a Sun Valley romance that ended in a $1.65 billion deal, YouTube’s video-sharing service remains hugely popular — but unprofitable.
snippet: Three years after YouTube and Google began a Sun Valley romance that ended in a $1.65 billion deal, YouTube’s video-sharing service remains hugely popular — but unprofitable.
lead_paragraph: In recent years, the high-powered guests at Allen & Company‘s conference in Sun Valley, Idaho, have taken to fawning over young Web entrepreneurs with big ideas but no business model.

headline.main: A Sun Valley Romance, Three Years Later

abstract: The online data backup market remains in need of some serious engineering muscle — and Google has plenty of that.
snippet: The online data backup market remains in need of some serious engineering muscle — and Google has plenty of that.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7/13/09 7:40 p.m.  Clarifying that the SwapDrive retail product is not Symantec’s main entry in online backup services for consumers

headline.main: Online Backups Could Use Google’s Expertise
